amendment.description: Amendment sought to express a sense of Congress that free speech should be protected.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to express a sense of Congress that free speech should be protected.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green (TN) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 233 (Roll no. 112).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Green (TN).
